title: Understanding Merge & Center
text: The 'Merge & Center' tool combines multiple cells into one, which can be useful for creating headers or titles that span across columns.

title: Limitations of Merge & Center
text: When you use 'Merge & Center', the individual cells are no longer accessible. This can cause issues if you need to work with the data in those cells later.

hintAnswer: it removed access to individual cells, as cells were merged
title: Why don't we always use the 'Merge & Center' tool?
text: Consider what happens to the individual cells when they are merged.
choices: it removed access to individual cells, as cells were merged
it removed access to editing, since it caused the worksheet to be saved in View Only
it is a more complex process
